text: Sometimes when I check out some of my previous uploads, I come across comments I made that make me feel old. I was thinking about how I feel some nostalgia with this game, only to read my comment on the #735 video mentioning I was currently playing and enjoying it. Time sure flies! And now with DQXI being officially announced in the West, I have a new Dragon Quest game to be excited about.

text: I consider IX to be the beginning of Sugiyama‚Äôs DQ decline but this and the angel land theme are definitely highlights.
author: jb1980ist

text:
I need to go back and play this again, since I got really far but never actually finished it. I love the Dragon Quest series, but I think DQ8 is my favourite. Although still haven't played anything before 7; hopefully they'll remaster or port them to newer consoles at some point.

At any rate, great series with great music. Things always feel familiar from game to game, but they somehow manage to strike a wonderful balance between nostalgic and fresh & exciting.
author: CitrusFury

text: I remember this game fondly due to the fact that there were record high summers in my area and this game came out around that time. Remembering the days that I was sweating like crazy, three fans pointed at me while I had cold drinks playing this game on a lazy afternoon.
author: Azure Alufei
